aztec-connect-depositors.description: Aztec V1 (Early eligibility): Deposit(s) totalling 0.1 ETH or greater. Aztec V2 (Ongoing): 3 Ethereum L1 Deposits (NOT DEFI DEPOSITS) totalling 0.1 ETH or greater. Dai deposits are not eligible.
aztec-connect-depositors.specs: The badge was botted and more strict requirements are enforced now. Early V1 Aztec users must have deposited at least 0.1 ETH (e.g 1 transaction of 0.1 ETH, or 4 transactions of 0.025 ETH. V2 Aztec users must have 3 deposits and those 3 deposits must total 0.1 ETH (e.g 3 transactions of 0.0333 ETH). Dai deposits are not supported.
